name: Arms Against Aliens
description:
This game is a short prototype, designed to demonstrate development capabilities in relation to game design, C# programming, voice recognition software and project management. As such, the current release lacks polish or any real length of gameplay. Watch this space for a more complete release, including:

  • Multiple Levels with Different Layouts
  • User-Activated Traps, to Detonate at the Right Time for a Tactical Advantage
  • Turret Upgrade Paths and Turret A.I Configuration
  • More Turret and Enemy Types

Arms Against Aliens is a straightforward tower-defence game that tasks you with protecting a military base from oncoming waves of alien invaders, who presumably wish to steal your elite grid-based-automated-ballistics-and-missile-defence technology... Manage your arsenal using either mouse controls or voice recognition - this game can be controlled entirely via spoken commands! Simply speak aloud the labels on buttons, or string together phrases to build, inspect, upgrade or sell turrets at a grid's location.

What are your orders, sir?
